display_long_description:
Swing, climb, and leap your way through a tropical VR playground!

Welcome to Paradis Island, a vibrant virtual paradise where movement is everything. Inspired by the exhilarating locomotion of Gorilla Tag, this game throws you into a lush island world where your arms are your only way to move. No buttons. No joysticks. Just pure physicality.

Run on all fours, scale towering cliffs, vault across canyons, and dive into crystal-clear lagoons—all with the freedom of fluid, physics-based motion. Whether you're racing your friends, exploring hidden caves, or pulling off wild stunts on palm-lined beaches, Paradis Island is your ultimate test of agility and creativity.

Features:

🌴 Unique arm-based locomotion in an open tropical world

🐒 Multiplayer free-roam and competitive minigames

🧗 Vertical gameplay—climb trees, cliffs, and ancient ruins

🏝️ Discover secrets, challenges, and dynamic environments

🎨 Customizable avatars and unlockable cosmetics

Get ready to sweat, laugh, and move like never before. Your island adventure begins now!
